entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as being impressed by the Decoy Detonators.

entities.name: george
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, who is enthusiastic about their business and shows Harry the Instant Darkness Powder.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Another one of Harry's friends, who points out the Decoy Detonators to Harry.

entities.name: peru
entities.description: The country from which they are importing Instant Darkness Powder.

entities.name: decody detonators
entities.description: A product that makes a loud noise out of sight, giving the user a diversion.

entities.name: instant darkness powder
entities.description: A product that creates instant darkness, useful for making a quick escape.

relationships.description: Harry is impressed by the Decoy Detonators and George shows them to him.
George shows Harry the Instant Darkness Powder, which they are importing from Peru.
Fred points out the Decoy Detonators to Harry.
George throws the Decoy Detonators to Harry.
